subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: That season’s Scarlet Knights used a high-octane offense and relentless defense to reach the Final Four with a 31-0 record, before losing to Michigan and U.C.L.A.
snippet: That season’s Scarlet Knights used a high-octane offense and relentless defense to reach the Final Four with a 31-0 record, before losing to Michigan and U.C.L.A.
